id: {Player} doubts the validity of the war

onSuccess.displayText:
{Player} shares with {Knight1} his uncertainty of the {Kingdom#Adjective} regime. This statement plants a seed of doubt in her mind, which eventually leads her to shelter a group of starving refugees from an enemy nation. At first, it was not a big deal, but as the war continued, she began to shelter increasingly more people, and word of this treasonous act would reach inquisitors from the {Kingdom#Adjective} army.

By a twisted stroke of fate, {Player} would be ordered to capture {Knight1} and bring her to heel.
